name: Mowing MADNESS (Bradalli)
description:
IT'S OUT OF CONTROL!! Mower Madness is a topdown grass mowing game where your automatic mower is running rampant and you must be careful not to get caught up in it's blades!

(DISCLAIMER: There is only one level and the difficulty has been ramped up a bit in accordance to this. There is no audio.)

Made in 48hrs for GMTK Game Jam 2020.
